abstract.t: This document proposes the VoxelVideo format, a file structure designed specifically for the efficient handling, playback, and livestreaming of 3D voxel-based videos. The format is intended for applications in gaming, virtual reality, live sports, and interactive media, providing a robust framework for managing complex 3D data with spatial precision and color fidelity. This document describes the current JSON-based version and outlines future plans to adopt a more efficent, compressed format.
